item.title: [pi] teleporting guide!
item.dc:creator: @IamGretar IamGretar
item.description:
@IamGretar wrote:

Well in the “DialogueHandler.java”
I wrote
?

case 47:
c.getPA().movePlayer(3087, 3500, 0);
sendNpcChat1(“This is the home”, c.talkingNpc, “Tutorial”);
c.nextChat = 48;

He only teleports to the place, how can i make him walk (what should the .moveplayer be)

Read full topic
